properties.areaDesc: The Islands to Vermilion OH beyond 5 nm off shoreline to US-Canadian border; The Islands to Vermilion OH
properties.headline: Gale Warning issued January 11 at 4:06AM EST until January 12 at 10:00AM EST by NWS Cleveland OH
properties.description:
* WHAT...For the Gale Warning, southwest winds 25 to 35 knots
with gusts up to 50 knots and waves 5 to 8 feet expected. For
the Low Water Advisory, abnormally low water levels expected.

* WHERE...Lake Erie nearshore waters from The Islands to
Vermilion OH and Lake Erie open waters from The Islands to
Vermilion OH.

* WHEN...For the Gale Warning, from 1 AM to 10 AM EST Sunday.
For the Low Water Advisory, from 1 AM to 4 PM EST Sunday.

* IMPACTS...Strong winds will cause hazardous waves which could
capsize or damage vessels and reduce visibility. Below normal
water levels will result in hazardous navigating conditions.

* ADDITIONAL DETAILS...As of 4 AM Saturday, the water level at
Toledo was 48 inches above low water datum, or 24 inches above
the critical mark for save navigation. Southwest gales are
expected over the lake on Sunday morning and will allow for
water levels to drop below the critical mark. Water levels will
return above the critical mark by late Sunday afternoon.
properties.instruction:
Mariners should alter plans to avoid these hazardous conditions.
Remain in port, seek safe harbor, alter course, and/or secure the
vessel for severe conditions.

Mariners should navigate shallow waters with extreme caution due
to below normal water levels.

NWSheadline: GALE WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 1 AM TO 10 AM EST SUNDAY... ...LOW WATER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 1 AM TO 4 PM EST SUNDAY
